articles.title: Pikmin Bloom Is Now Available To Download Across Europe, Asia And Africa - Nintendo Life
articles.content:
Niantic's latest AR game Pikmin Bloom is now available to download in Europe, Africa, and select countries across Asia.
Made in partnership with Nintendo, the app has you growing your Pikmin, making… [+2729 chars]
